title: The Hunt
description: 90 years after William Balder disappeared, he has returned. He's been found by Jack Anderson in a Provincial Park in Ontario. After unknowingly leading authorities to Will, Jack is forced to flee across North America with him. The two men pick up an old friend of Will's along the way and the 3 of them track across the Southern U.S. in search of a secret Government Facility that may hold the key to their escape.This book is available for purchase at http://thundernetworks.info/TrevorAut...
author: Trevor Couturier
